instruction: List three examples of a non-verbal communication.
output: Non-verbal communication includes facial expressions, body language, gestures, tones of voice, and eye contact. Examples of non-verbal communication include smiling, pointing, nodding, crossing arms, using hand gestures, raising eyebrows, and making direct eye contact. Each of these methods are used to convey messages without speaking, and can be beneficial in enhancing and reinforcing verbal communication.
